message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, thanks for your response. I understand your position, but $14,000 is already a very competitive price for this product and its value. How about we meet in the middle at $12,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still believe that $10,000 is a fair price for this product. I hope we can reach an agreement closer to my initial offer.
